text: Park Soo-jin (; born December 4, 1995) is a South Korean singer. She joined Brave Entertainment in 2014 while she was a semi-finalist on the MBC audition program The Great Birth Season 3. She also appeared on Immortal Song: Singing the Legend in 2014. == Music career == === 2013–present: Solo debut === Park Soo-jin officially debuted on March 14, 2013 with her first single "My Story". On December 11, 2014 she came out with her second single "Fallin" with a music video released the same day. ==Discography== ===Singles=== {| class="wikitable" |- ! Year ! Song ! Featured Artist ! Album !
